signIn.title: Welcome to OtherShorts
signIn.subtitle: Explore and rate YouTube Shorts from other users' watch histories

profileSetup.title: Complete Your Profile
profileSetup.guidanceText: This information is anonymous and helps others discover content from different demographics.
profileSetup.ageError: Please enter a valid age between 13 and 100.

uploadTakeout.title: Add Your Shorts
uploadTakeout.subtitle: Upload your 'watch-history.json' or '시청 기록.html' file to share your shorts.
uploadTakeout.successMessage: Your shorts have been added to the pool.
uploadTakeout.errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred during upload.

home.title: Home
home.errorNoVideos: No videos found. Upload your watch history.
home.errorFetch: Failed to load videos. Please try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.contactDescription: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
settings.githubIssue: You can also open an issue on our GitHub repository.
settings.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out?
